pages.text: Dispenses items. Respects the placement behaviour of items, ie can place boats & minecarts, or shoot arrows.$(br2)The only special case is for $(thing)blocks$(): the module will attempt to place a block instead of dispensing the item.$(br2)The $(thing)top$() and $(thing)bottom$() orientations will add an offset dispense one block above and three blocks below the boat, respectively.

$(br)Each row will dispense at a different height.$(li)$(italics)Top$() dispenses 2 blocks above the boat.$()$(li)$(italics)Middle$() dispenses 1 block above the boat.$()$(li)$(italics)Bottom$() dispenses at the same height as the boat.$()$(br2)You can also select the orientation of the module, which is relative to the boat.$(br2)Finally, the period at which to dispense is also configurable here.
